entries.title: Chart: Elon Musk is spurring growth at Mastodon
entries.description: A chart shows Mastodon user growth as of December 2022 since Elon Musk purchased Twitter in October.

entries.title: Girl Scout mom kicked out of Radio City and barred from seeing Rockettes after facial recognition tech identified her
entries.description: An attorney from a law firm suing the parent company of Radio City Music Hall was kicked out of the venue while trying to see a Rockettes performance with her

entries.title: How Tory Lanez trial bloggers are shaping the conversation around Megan Thee Stallion
entries.description: Misinformation about Megan Thee Stallion is going viral as the Tory Lanez trial begins.

entries.title: Artists in Cuba find themselves blocked   from NFT trading sites
entries.description: When everything seemed to be going wrong, Cuban multimedia artist Alejandro Pablo García Alarcón found a solution in what some might consider an unusual place:

entries.title: Elon Musk says he will resign as Twitter's CEO when he finds a replacement
entries.description: Elon Musk will step down as Twitter’s chief executive after he finds someone “foolish” enough to replace him, he said Tuesday.
